doc.field: Subdivisions are popping up all over especially on the east side but 282 has a good many People from Urban areas are developing this "small" town Ellijay is a vacation escape location with numerous vacation cabin rentals and second homes. Coosawattee River Resort- The Coosawattee River Resort is a 8,500 + acre development consisting of more than 7,000 individual, privately owned lots. Blackberry Mountain is a development on the banks of the Cartecay River with Blackberry Falls. Walnut Mountain featuring second homes and vacation cabins is located deep in the Rich Mountains along the banks of Turniptown Creek.
